key_features_html:
• 1200W motor blends smoothies, shakes, and sauces
  • 6-blade design for efficient chopping and crushing
  • 5-speed control plus pulse for precise textures
  • Dishwasher-safe parts for easy cleanup
  • Durable plastic jar; stainless steel finish
  • Compact 12x8x10 in size saves counter space
  • Lightweight at 5 lbs for easy handling

walmart_description: Upgrade your kitchen with the BrandCo Countertop Blender, a versatile kitchen appliance for daily blending tasks. A robust 1200W motor powers a 6-blade design to process smoothies, shakes, sauces, and more. Five-speed control with pulse lets you fine-tune texture, while dishwasher-safe parts streamline cleanup. The durable plastic jar pairs with a stainless steel finish for a modern look that suits any countertop. Measuring 12x8x10 inches and weighing just 5 lbs, it’s compact and easy to handle without sacrificing performance. From crushing ice for a shake to pureeing ingredients for a sauce, this blender delivers consistent results. Backed by a 5-year warranty, BrandCo provides reliable performance and support for your kitchen.
meta_description: Blend smoothies, shakes, and sauces with the BrandCo 1200W blender. 6-blade design, 5-speed control, dishwasher-safe parts, durable plastic jar, 5-year warranty.
